creator: paul_evenblij@nl.compuware.com
text:
Calling drawImage() on SVGGraphics2D always results in a new raster image being 
embedded in the SVG document, or written to an external file. This may result in 
multiple copies of the image data. Some way of caching these images is called 
for.

A patch plus some new files for this issue can be found at the given URL. All of 
the new files should go into org.apache.batik.svggen.

creator: paul_evenblij@nl.compuware.com
text:
I also propose to update the SVGGraphics2D web tutorial with some info about 
image handling. See patch: svggen.xml.diff.txt, at the same URL.

Paul's contribution has been integrated into the SVG generator module.
The SVGGraphics2D now uses a higher level interface (GenericImageHandler)
for handling image representation strategy.
creator: vincent.hardy@sun.com
